  • OS: windows 8

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 700
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9

  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9

results.name: Sonucido: The Mage - A Dungeon Crawler by Daniel da Silva

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any recent distro should work
  • Processor: i3-6100 / Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 / Vega 3
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: I used MX Linux for developing the game
  • Processor: i3-8100 / Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 / RX 550
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
